text: @realDonaldTrump @NYCMayor @NYGovCuomo @realDonaldTrump came to the rescue and saved us here in NYC from covid-19 (uss comfort, nat’l guard, masks n vents) & will end up saving us again from the violent radical protesters & looters too.. thank you Mr President.
